snippet.title: The Dark World: Karma - Official Trailer | TGS 2022
snippet.description:
Sink into the unsettling world of The Dark World: Karma in its latest trailer. Revealed during the Gamera Games Now TGS 2022 Special Show, the new trailer invites us into the strange world of the upcoming first-person psychological horror game. Set in a fictional city tightly controlled by a giant corporation called Leviathan, you'll take on the role of an investigation officer.

The Dark World: Karma is coming to PC via Steam in 2023. Developer, Pollard Studio, will also bring the game to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, PS4, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #Gaming #TheDarkWorld
